author: cjodea
msg: added utility methods for launching server to base test class

author: andreasmyth
msg: made system test source checkstyle compliant

author: andreasmyth
msg: Added utilities for server side specific construction and initialisation of EndpointRefereneType instances.

Given the implementing class, a WSDL contract is created on the fly (using the generators) and stored (under the key of the implementing class) in the WSDL manager. The endpoint reference itself accesses the definition through the class name.
Ensured system test sources are checkstyled and added utility to generate a script to facilitate running any applications standalone in the same environment as used by unit (or system) tests.

author: cjodea
msg: changed system test to run server as separate process
